cards.name: 过河拆桥
cards.cnName: Crossing the river to break the bridge
cards.effect: During your turn: target any player's equipment or card in hand; discard that card. This card is not affected by range.

cards.name: 火攻
cards.effect: During your turn: target any other player with cards in their hand; that player must reveal (to all players) one card in their hand. You may choose to discard 1 card in your hand of the same suit; deal 1 Fire Damage to the target player.

cards.name: 借刀杀人
cards.cnName: Borrowing a blade to kill someone
cards.effect: During your turn: target a player with an equipped weapon, then target another player in their attack range; the first player may either choose to play an Attack card targeting the second player, or to give control of their equipped weapon to you.

cards.name: 决斗
cards.effect: During your turn: target any other player; starting with the targeted player, alternate discarding Attack cards, between you and them only. Stop when a player can no longer discard Attack cards; that player is dealt 1 Damage. This card is not affected by range.

cards.name: 南蛮入侵
cards.effect: During your turn: all players (other than you, in turn order) must play an Attack card or take 1 damage.

cards.name: 顺手牵羊
cards.cnName: Guiding your hand and pulling a sheep
cards.effect: During your turn: target a player within 1 distance and target one equipment or card in hand: add that card to your hand or you may choose to equip it immediately if possible.

cards.name: 桃园结义
cards.cnName: Vow of brotherhood at the peach garden
cards.effect: During your turn: all remaining players heal 1 health.

cards.name: 铁索连环
cards.effect: During your turn: choose one of the following: 1) Target two players; those two players are now [Shackled]. 2) Target two [Shackled] players that were [Shackled] by the effect of another [Iron Shackle] card; those two players are now [Unshackled]. When a [Shackled] player receives Fire or Lightning Damage: deal the same amount and type of damage to all other [Shackled] players, then [Unshackle] all players. Damage specifically dealt by the effect of [Shackle] cannot be negated by Dodge or Negate.

cards.name: 万箭齐发
cards.cnName: Ten thousand arrows ready to fire
cards.effect: During your turn: all players (other than you, in turn order) must play a Dodge card or take 1 damage.

cards.name: 五谷丰登
cards.effect: During your turn: reveal cards from the top of the Deck, one for remaining player; starting from the turn player and going in turn order, each player selects one card to add to their hand.

cards.name: 无懈可击
cards.effect: Destroy or negate the activation of any card. When used on a card that affects multiple players, negate the effects applying to one player only.

cards.name: 无中生有
cards.effect: During your turn: draw 2 cards.

cards.name: 兵粮寸断
cards.effect: During your turn: target any player within range; place this card beside their Hero. During that player's turn draw: discard the top card of the Draw Pile; if that card is any suit other than Clubs, the turn player cannot draw during their regular turn draw this turn.

cards.name: 乐不思蜀
cards.effect: During your turn: target any player, disregarding range; place this card beside their Hero. During that player's turn draw: discard the top card of the Draw Pile; if that card is any suit other than Hearts, the turn player cannot perform any actions (besides drawing) this turn and proceeds immediately to the Discard Phase.

cards.name: 闪电
cards.effect: During your turn: place this card beside your own Hero. During that player's turn draw: discard the top card of the Draw Pile; if that card is a Spade between 2 and 9 inclusive, the turn player takes 3 Lightning Damage, otherwise move this card to the next turn player. When using Negate to respond to this card, it must be used before the card check; furthermore Negate only negates the check and damage to the current turn player and moves this card to the next player.

cards.name: 雌雄双股剑
cards.effect: Range +2. When attacking a Hero with opposite gender as your Hero: that Hero's player may choose one option (must be done before playing Dodge): 1) Discard 1 random card from their hand. 2) Allow the attacking player to draw 1 card.

cards.name: 方天画戟
cards.effect: Range +4. When using an Attack and it is the last card in your hand: target up to 3 different other players within range; this Attack applies to all targeted players.

cards.name: 贯石斧
cards.effect: Range +3. When your Attack has been Dodged: you may discard 2 cards (from equipped cards or in the hand); replay the Dodged attack as if were a new attack.

cards.name: 寒冰剑
cards.effect: Range +2. When your Attack would inflict damage to a player: you may discard 2 cards (or until you cannot discard any more) from that player's hand (randomly) or equipment; prevent all damage inflicted.

cards.name: 麒麟弓
cards.effect: Range +5. When your Attack inflicts damage to a player: you may target one of their equipped horses; discard that horse.

cards.name: 青釭剑
cards.effect: Range +2. When using an Attack card: you may ignore any Armor the defending Hero has equipped.

cards.name: 青龙偃月刀
cards.effect: Range +3. When using any Attack card that has been Dodged (including from this effect): You may play another Attack card against the same player.

cards.name: 丈八蛇矛
cards.effect: Range +3. Whenever an Attack can be played by you: you may discard two cards from the hand; treat this as if you had played an Attack card.

cards.name: 诸葛连弩
cards.effect: Range +1. During your turn, when you can take an action: there is no limit to the number of Attack cards you can play as an action.

cards.name: 朱雀羽扇
cards.effect: Range +4. When you Attack with a normal Attack: you may choose to add the Fire attribute to your Attack.

cards.name: 古锭刀
cards.effect: Range +2. When your Attack inflicts damage, if the target does not have any cards in their hand: increase the damage by 1.

cards.name: 八卦阵
cards.effect: Whenever you would be allowed to play a Dodge: you may discard the top card of the Draw Pile; if that card is of any red suit, automatically Dodge without playing card(s).

cards.name: 白银狮子
cards.effect: All damage received by the owner is set to 1. When this card is unequipped: heal 1 health.

cards.name: 仁王盾
cards.effect: All Attack cards of any black suit (including Attacks generated/substituted by the effects of cards of any black suit) have no effect on the owner.

cards.name: 藤甲
cards.effect: Attack cards, Barbarians (南蛮入侵) and Raining Arrows (万箭齐发) cards have no effect on the owner. Increase all Fire Damage received by the owner by 1.

cards.name: 赤兔
cards.effect: -1 Horse (Offensive and Physical Range +1)

cards.name: 大宛
cards.effect: -1 Horse (Offensive and Physical Range +1)

cards.name: 的卢
cards.effect: +1 Horse (Defensive Range +1)

cards.name: 骅骝
cards.effect: +1 Horse (Defensive Range +1)

cards.name: 绝影
cards.effect: +1 Horse (Defensive Range +1)

cards.name: 爪黄飞电
cards.effect: +1 Horse (Defensive Range +1)

cards.name: 紫骍
cards.effect: -1 Horse (Offensive and Physical Range +1)

heroes.name: 刘备
heroes.blurb: The ambitious leader in tumultuous times
heroes.effect:
仁德
During your turn: give any number of cards in your hand to any number of players. If the number of cards given by this effect in one turn exceeds 1, heal 1 health.

激将
When you could play an Attack card: you may target any Shu Hero; that player can choose to play an Attack card on your behalf.

heroes.name: 暮年诸葛亮
heroes.blurb: Prime minister who has passed his prime
heroes.effect:
观星
During the start of your turn: you may view, up to the greater between 5 and the number of players still in the game, cards from the top of the deck; rearrange those cards and place them (however you choose to split them) on the top or bottom of the deck.

空城
When you have no cards in the hand: you cannot be targeted by Attack or [Duel] (决斗) cards.

heroes.name: 赵云
heroes.effect:
龙胆
All Dodge and Attack cards can be used interchangeably.

heroes.name: 关羽
heroes.effect:
武圣
All cards with a red suit can be used as an Attack card.

heroes.name: 黄月英
heroes.effect:
集智
When using a tool card: you can draw 1 card.

奇才
Your tool cards do not have range restrictions.

heroes.name: 马超
heroes.blurb: Lone horseman that can outmatch a thousand troops
heroes.effect:
马术
Add -1 Horse (Offensive and Physical Range +1) to all range calculations involving this Hero.

铁骑
When this Hero Attacks: you may you may discard the top card of the Draw Pile; if that card is of any red suit, that Attack cannot be evaded with a Dodge.

heroes.name: 张飞
heroes.blurb: A thousand men can't stop him
heroes.effect:
咆哮

During your turn, when you can take an action: there is no limit to the number of Attack cards you can play as an action.

heroes.name: 曹操
heroes.blurb: Warrior Emperor of the Kingdom of Wei
heroes.effect:
奸雄
When a card(s) successfully instigates and inflicts damage to you: you may add those card(s) to the hand.

护驾
When you could play a Dodge card: you may target any Wei Hero; that player can choose to play a Dodge card on your behalf.

heroes.name: 孙权
heroes.effect:
制衡
Once per your turn, when you can take actions: you can discard (from the hand or equipped cards) any number of cards; draw that many cards.

救援
When any Wu character uses a Peach on this character with 0 health: heal 1 additional health.

heroes.name: 貂蝉
heroes.effect:
离间
Once per your turn, when you can take actions: you can discard (from the hand or equipped cards) one card and target two Male Heroes; those characters undergo a [Duel] (决斗). This effect is not affected by [Negate] (无懈可击).

闭月
When your turn ends: you may draw 1 card.

heroes.name: 神诸葛亮
heroes.blurb: The Sorcerer at the Red Cliffs
heroes.effect:
七星
At the start of the game: instead of being dealt 4 cards, draw 11 cards and select 4 as your starting hand. The remaining cards are removed from play facedown, marked as [Star] cards. After your turn draw: you may exchange any number of cards in the hand with any number of [Star] cards.

狂风
During the end of your turn: you may discard 1 [Star] card and target 1 player; until when your next turn would be, all Fire Damage dealt to that player is increased by 1.

大雾
During the end of your turn: you can discard any number of [Star] cards and target that many player(s); until when your next turn would be, all targeted players are immune to all Damage except Lightning Damage.
